name: ULTIMATE SANTA GAME (W2AF)
description:
This prototype was made by students of the 2nd cycle (2020-2) of the "Design and development of video games and digital entertainment" at the Toulouse Lautrec institute - Lima - Peru.

Done as a final work of the cycle, it is now published for the satisfaction of the users.

DEVELOPERS:

- Game Designer: 

Adrián Alejandro Malpartida Calderón.

- Programmers:

 Pool Francis Perez Chinga.

 Walter Antonio Sáenz Senmache.

- Art: 

Andrea Carolina Alcántara Jo.
